PyMT - API DocumentationÂ¶

  • Core - base class for pymt
    • geometric - utility for 3D mesh handling
    • graphx - generic drawing functions
    • gesture - gesture recognition
    • loader - asynchronous way to load image
    • mtpyglet - multitouch abstraction for pyglet
    • obj - handle 3D mesh
    • plugin - pymt plugin architecture
    • shader - abstraction to handle shader
    • vector - generic vector class
  • UI - all user interface stuff
    • Animation - helper to make powerfull animations
    • Factory - widget factory, used to make dynamic interface
    • Layout - horizontal, vertical layout arrangment
    • Simulator - implementation of multitouch with mouse
    • UI - core widgets
    • Gesture widget - capture and signal every gesture
    • Video - video player widget
    • Wallpaper Window - a simple window with background
    • Window - generic multitouch window
